metadata.vision: ROTK11-inspired text strategy with extensible 40+ city support

2.name: Interactive Combat Systems
2.goal: Duels, tactical battles, and dramatic combat

6.name: Comprehensive Integration Tests
6.goal: ROTK11-style deep gameplay validation based on 3KYuYun analysis

tasks.title: Create Data-Driven Map/City JSON Schema
tasks.description: Create src/data/ directory structure with JSON schemas for maps, cities, and adjacency. Design for extensibility - should easily support 6 cities (current) or 40+ cities (full game). Include terrain types, coordinates, province groupings.
acceptance_criteria: Include city coordinates for map rendering
Include terrain type per city (plains, mountain, coastal)

tasks.title: Refactor world.py to Load from JSON
tasks.description: Modify world.py to load city/map data from JSON files instead of hardcoded CITY_DATA dict. Maintain backward compatibility. Add function to load different scenarios.
acceptance_criteria: world.py loads city data from JSON
CITY_DATA and ADJACENCY_MAP derived from JSON

tasks.title: Create ASCII Map Renderer Module
tasks.description: Create src/display/map_view.py that generates ASCII strategic map from JSON data. Use Unicode box drawing. Support variable number of cities. Show faction colors, capitals, connections.
acceptance_criteria: Cities show faction ownership with color codes
Capital cities marked with special symbol (★)
Map scales based on city count
Works with both 6-city and planned 40-city maps

tasks.title: Create City Detail View Renderer
tasks.description: Create src/display/city_view.py that renders detailed city view with ASCII art, progress bars for development levels, stationed officers list, and resources.
acceptance_criteria: Progress bars for agriculture, commerce, tech, walls (████░░)
Lists stationed officers with their current tasks
ASCII city icon based on walls level

tasks.title: Create Officer Profile View with ASCII Portrait
tasks.description: Create src/display/officer_view.py that renders officer profile with ASCII portrait placeholder, stat bars, traits, and relationships section (placeholder for now).
acceptance_criteria: ASCII portrait box (placeholder character based on first name char)
Progress bars for all stats (leadership, intelligence, etc.)

tasks.title: Create UI Components Library
tasks.description: Create src/display/components.py with reusable ASCII UI components: progress bars, boxes, tables, separators, faction color codes.

tasks.title: Integrate Map Display into Game
tasks.description: Add map display to CLI (game.py) and web interface. Show at turn start, add 'map' command. Update templates.
acceptance_criteria: 'map' command shows strategic map in CLI
Map shown at start of each turn

tasks.title: Add Seasonal System to Models
tasks.description: Add Season enum and effects to models/constants. Seasons based on month: Spring (3-5), Summer (6-8), Autumn (9-11), Winter (12-2). Each has gameplay effects.
acceptance_criteria: i18n for season names and descriptions

tasks.title: Create Turn Report Generator
tasks.description: Create src/display/reports.py that generates narrative turn summaries with seasonal flavor text, categorized events (Economy, Military, Diplomatic, Officer).

tasks.title: Integrate Turn Reports into Game Loop
tasks.description: Modify engine.py end_turn() to collect and return events. Display turn report in CLI and web after each turn ends.
acceptance_criteria: end_turn() returns list of TurnEvent objects
TurnEvent dataclass with category, message, data
Web displays report in dedicated section

tasks.title: Create Officer JSON Data Files
tasks.description: Create src/data/officers/legendary.json with expanded officer roster (30+ officers). Include stats, traits, relationships, quotes, special abilities.
acceptance_criteria: All three kingdoms represented (Wei, Shu, Wu)
Include: Zhao Yun, Ma Chao, Huang Zhong, Wei Yan, Xu Chu, Xiahou Dun, Xiahou Yuan, Zhang He, Lu Su, Lu Meng, Gan Ning, Taishi Ci, etc.

tasks.title: Load Officers from JSON Data
tasks.description: Update world.py to load officers from JSON. Support loading subset of officers based on scenario. Maintain backward compatibility.
acceptance_criteria: Scenario can specify which officers to include
Existing OFFICER_DATA still works as fallback

tasks.title: Create Duel System Core Mechanics
tasks.description: Create src/systems/duel.py with duel mini-game mechanics. Officers have HP, can choose actions (Attack, Defend, Special). WAR stat affects damage and hit rate.
acceptance_criteria: Duel dataclass with attacker, defender, HP, round
Damage based on WAR stat differential
Attack: standard damage, may trade blows
Special: high damage, lower hit rate

tasks.title: Create Duel Display Renderer
tasks.description: Create src/display/duel_view.py that renders duel state with HP bars, round info, combat log, and action choices.
acceptance_criteria: Shows both combatants with HP bars

tasks.title: Integrate Duel into Game Flow
tasks.description: Add 'duel' command/option during battles. Winning duel damages enemy morale. Losing kills/captures your officer. Add to CLI and web.
acceptance_criteria: Duel can be offered during battle
Web shows duel UI with buttons
Enemy AI decides whether to accept

tasks.title: Add Terrain Types to Map Data
tasks.description: Extend map JSON with terrain types. Each city has terrain that affects combat. Types: Plains, Mountain, Forest, Coastal, River Crossing.
acceptance_criteria: Each city has terrain field in JSON

tasks.title: Create Tactical Battle Map Renderer
tasks.description: Create src/display/battle_view.py that renders tactical battle map showing terrain, unit positions, siege progress, weather.
acceptance_criteria: Unit boxes with commander, troop count, type

tasks.title: Create Tactical Battle System
tasks.description: Create src/systems/battle.py with tactical battle mechanics. Battles have multiple turns, positioning, terrain effects. Replace simple attack() with tactical system.
acceptance_criteria: Units can be positioned in different terrain zones
Battle actions: Attack, Defend, Flank, Fire Attack, Retreat

tasks.title: Create Battle Narrative Generator
tasks.description: Create src/display/battle_narrator.py that generates dramatic prose describing battle events. Mentions commanders by name, describes terrain, weather.
acceptance_criteria: Multiple narrative templates per event type

tasks.title: Integrate Tactical Battles into Game
tasks.description: Replace simple attack command with tactical battle system. CLI presents battle choices, web shows battle UI.
acceptance_criteria: Player chooses tactics each battle turn
Battle can span multiple game interactions

tasks.title: Add Weather System
tasks.description: Add weather mechanics that affect battles and movement. Weather changes seasonally and randomly. Types: Clear, Rain, Snow, Fog, Drought.

tasks.title: Add Unit Types Model
tasks.description: Extend City model to track different unit types: Infantry, Cavalry, Archers. Each has strengths/weaknesses. Rock-paper-scissors combat.

tasks.title: Create Council System Foundation
tasks.description: Create src/systems/council.py with morning council mechanics. Advisors present agenda items based on game state (threats, opportunities, personnel).
acceptance_criteria: Advisors chosen by highest relevant stat

tasks.title: Create Council Display Renderer
tasks.description: Create src/display/council_view.py that renders council meeting with agenda items, advisor portraits, and recommendation details.

tasks.title: Integrate Council into Game Flow
tasks.description: Add 'council' command that shows advisor meeting. Can be called at turn start. Decisions affect game state.

tasks.title: Add Officer Relationship System
tasks.description: Add relationships to Officer model. Types: SwornBrother, Rival, Lord, Spouse, Mentor. Relationships affect loyalty and combat.

tasks.title: Display Relationships in Officer Profile
tasks.description: Update officer_view.py to show relationships with affinity hearts. Integrate relationship bonuses into combat and loyalty.

tasks.title: Create Random Event System
tasks.description: Create src/systems/events.py with random event mechanics. Events have triggers, effects, and player choices. Load events from JSON.
acceptance_criteria: Event dataclass with trigger, effects, choices
Events can be positive, negative, or neutral

tasks.title: Create Event Display and Integration
tasks.description: Create event UI and integrate into game loop. Events shown with narrative, choices, and outcomes.
acceptance_criteria: CLI and web both support events

tasks.title: Add Technology Tree Structure
tasks.description: Create technology tree in models/data. Technologies have prerequisites, costs, and effects. Categories: Military, Economy, Special.

tasks.title: Implement Technology Research
tasks.description: Add research command and mechanics. Officers research techs over multiple turns. Tech unlocks apply bonuses.
acceptance_criteria: Research progress per turn based on INT

tasks.title: Add Building System
tasks.description: Create building system. Cities can construct buildings that provide bonuses. Buildings: Barracks, Market, Granary, Academy, Forge, Walls.
acceptance_criteria: Building dataclass with cost, time, effects

tasks.title: Create Historical Events System
tasks.description: Create historical events that trigger based on year and game conditions. Events like Peach Garden Oath, Red Cliff, etc.

tasks.title: Add Special Abilities to Officers
tasks.description: Add unique special abilities to legendary officers. Abilities have triggers, costs, and dramatic effects.
acceptance_criteria: Ability dataclass with effect, cost, cooldown

tasks.title: Create Achievement System
tasks.description: Create achievement/goal system. Achievements track progress and unlock prestige. Goals provide intermediate objectives.

tasks.title: Create Turn Preview System
tasks.description: Create 'one more turn' hook by showing preview of upcoming events. Preview shows pending arrivals, threats, completions.

tasks.title: Add Officer Dialogue System
tasks.description: Create src/systems/dialogue.py with personality-based dialogue. Officers speak differently based on traits. Used in council, events, battles.
acceptance_criteria: At least 5 contexts: greeting, advice, battle, victory, defeat

tasks.title: Integrate Dialogue Throughout Game
tasks.description: Use dialogue system in council, events, battles, and officer interactions. Officers should feel alive.

tasks.title: Add Espionage System
tasks.description: Expand spy mechanics. Can sabotage, steal intelligence, incite defection, assassinate. Risk of being caught.
acceptance_criteria: Success based on INT vs target

tasks.title: Add Surrender and Capture Mechanics
tasks.description: After battle victories, defeated officers can be captured. Captured officers can be recruited, executed, or released.
acceptance_criteria: Captured officers stored in captor's faction

tasks.title: Create Full 40+ City Map Data
tasks.description: Create comprehensive china_208_full.json with 40+ cities matching ROTK11 geography. All provinces, terrain, adjacencies.

tasks.title: Create Multiple Scenarios
tasks.description: Create 4 historical scenarios with different start dates, factions, and officer distributions.
acceptance_criteria: Each scenario has appropriate map state

tasks.title: Add Naval Combat System
tasks.description: Add naval units and water combat. Coastal cities can build ships. Some routes require naval crossing.

tasks.title: Add Alliance System
tasks.description: Create formal alliance mechanics. Alliance types: Non-aggression, Defensive, Offensive. Can be broken with penalty.
acceptance_criteria: Defensive: join wars when ally attacked

tasks.title: Add Supply Line System
tasks.description: Armies on campaign consume supplies. Cut supply lines to starve enemies. Foraging in friendly territory.
acceptance_criteria: Supply days shown in battle UI

tasks.title: Add Population System
tasks.description: Cities have population that affects recruitment, production, and morale. Population grows/shrinks based on conditions.

tasks.title: Add Marriage/Hostage System
tasks.description: Diplomatic marriages and hostage exchanges. Marriages create alliances. Hostages ensure treaty compliance.

tasks.title: Add Difficulty Settings with AI Enhancement
tasks.description: Make difficulty setting actually affect gameplay. AI gets bonuses on higher difficulties. Add AI personality types.

tasks.title: Integration Test: Unit Type Combat Matrix
tasks.description: Test rock-paper-scissors unit combat (Infantry beats Cavalry, Cavalry beats Archers, Archers beat Infantry). Verify bonuses apply correctly across all matchups including naval units.
acceptance_criteria: Test naval vs land unit interactions
Verify terrain modifiers stack with unit bonuses

tasks.title: Integration Test: Fire Attack Conditions
tasks.description: Test fire attack effectiveness based on weather (drought +50%, rain -20%), terrain (forest +25%), and naval combat (+50%). Based on 3KYuYun's fire deity/ghost gate analysis.
acceptance_criteria: Test fire attack in drought weather
Test fire attack in rain weather
Test fire attack on forest terrain

tasks.title: Integration Test: Duel System with Abilities
tasks.description: Test duel mini-game with special abilities triggering. Verify WAR stat affects damage, test all duel actions (Attack, Defend, Special), and ability effects.
acceptance_criteria: Test duel victory effects on morale
Test officer capture on duel defeat

tasks.title: Integration Test: Officer Ability Rankings
tasks.description: Verify top-tier officer abilities work as expected. Test combat abilities (Hegemon, Brave General, Flying General, Divine General, Fighting God) and strategist abilities (Divine Calculation, Deep Strategy, Reality and Illusion) effectiveness.
acceptance_criteria: Verify ability effectiveness rankings match design

tasks.title: Integration Test: Deputy General Synergy
tasks.description: Test deputy general mechanics. Verify stat combinations, ability sharing, and formation bonuses when officers serve as deputies.

tasks.title: Integration Test: Naval Combat Superiority
tasks.description: Test naval warfare mechanics including blocking water routes (economic sanctions concept). Based on 3KYuYun's water combat analysis.

tasks.title: Integration Test: City Defense Mechanics
tasks.description: Test defensive city mechanics including wall bonuses, terrain advantages, and siege attrition. Based on 3KYuYun's 'easy to defend, hard to attack' city analysis.

tasks.title: Integration Test: Capture and Recruitment
tasks.description: Test capture mechanics including capture probability calculation, loyalist refusal, and recruitment of captured officers.

tasks.title: Integration Test: Sworn Brotherhood Mechanics
tasks.description: Test sworn brotherhood mechanics including loyalty bonuses, combat bonuses, and emotional triggers. Based on 3KYuYun's brotherhood analysis.
acceptance_criteria: Test morale effect on brother death

tasks.title: Integration Test: Marriage and Family
tasks.description: Test marriage system mechanics including spouse loyalty, alliance effects, and helpmeet bonuses.
acceptance_criteria: Test internal affairs bonus from spouse

tasks.title: Integration Test: Technology Research Path
tasks.description: Test technology tree progression including prerequisites, research time, and effect application.

tasks.title: Integration Test: Building Construction ROI
tasks.description: Test building system cost/benefit including construction time, bonuses, and optimal build orders. Based on 3KYuYun's economic efficiency analysis.

tasks.title: Integration Test: Full Campaign Conquest
tasks.description: Test complete game from start to unification. Verify all systems integrate correctly over extended play.

tasks.title: Integration Test: AI Difficulty Scaling
tasks.description: Test AI behavior across difficulty levels. Based on 3KYuYun's PvP vs PvE analysis.

tasks.title: Integration Test: Weather-Season Chain
tasks.description: Test weather and season system interactions across multiple turns.

tasks.title: Integration Test: Supply Line Warfare
tasks.description: Test supply system including line calculation, foraging, and attrition when cut off.
acceptance_criteria: Test supply days in battle UI

tasks.title: Integration Test: Historical Event Triggers
tasks.description: Test historical event system including trigger conditions, effects, and chaining.

tasks.title: Integration Test: Multi-Front War
tasks.description: Test managing simultaneous conflicts on multiple fronts.

tasks.title: Integration Test: Diplomatic Alliance Chain
tasks.description: Test alliance system including formation, coordination, and dissolution.

tasks.title: Integration Test: Complete Web Interface Flow
tasks.description: Test all gameplay features through web interface end-to-end.

completed.title: Fixed missing flask-session dependency
completed.description: Installed flask-session package that was preventing tests from running
